nodes.label: Geometry Reference
nodes.description: Reference existing geometry into the graph.

nodes.label: Text
nodes.description: Floating canvas text with a handwritten style.

nodes.label: Group
nodes.description: Organize nodes visually inside a shared container.

nodes.label: Panel
nodes.description: Read-only viewer for upstream outputs or fallback text.

nodes.label: Text Note
nodes.description: Display + pass through data with a freeform note.

nodes.label: Slider
nodes.description: A draggable slider that outputs a numeric value.

nodes.label: Mesh
nodes.description: Pass-through node for mesh geometry.

nodes.label: Color Picker
nodes.description: Pick a color swatch and output RGB + hex.

nodes.label: Custom Material
nodes.description: Apply a custom render color to geometry.

nodes.label: Annotations
nodes.description: Attach annotation text to a point or geometry.

nodes.label: Geometry Viewer
nodes.description: Preview geometry in a mini viewport.

nodes.label: Custom Viewer
nodes.description: Expose geometry for Roslyn preview.

nodes.label: Filter
nodes.description: Roslyn preview filters for Custom Preview nodes.

nodes.label: Custom Preview
nodes.description: Preview geometry with a custom filter payload.

nodes.label: Metadata Panel
nodes.description: Inspect geometry metadata and attributes.

nodes.label: Mesh Convert
nodes.description: Convert geometry into a mesh for export.

nodes.label: NURBS to Mesh
nodes.description: Convert NURBS curves or surfaces into a mesh.

nodes.label: B-Rep to Mesh
nodes.description: Tessellate a B-Rep into a renderable mesh.

nodes.label: Mesh to B-Rep
nodes.description: Convert a mesh into a triangle-based B-Rep.

nodes.label: Subdivide Mesh
nodes.description: Subdivide a mesh using linear, Catmull-Clark, Loop, or adaptive schemes.

nodes.label: Dual Mesh
nodes.description: Flip faces and vertices to create a dual mesh.

nodes.label: Inset Faces
nodes.description: Inset mesh faces to create panels and borders.

nodes.label: Extrude Faces
nodes.description: Extrude selected faces along normals or a fixed axis.

nodes.label: Mesh Relax
nodes.description: Smooth a mesh with Laplacian relaxation.

nodes.label: Select Faces
nodes.description: Select mesh faces by area, normal direction, or index pattern.

nodes.label: Mesh Boolean
nodes.description: Combine two meshes with union, difference, or intersection.

nodes.label: Triangulate Mesh
nodes.description: Convert all faces to triangles.

nodes.label: Geodesic Sphere
nodes.description: Generate a geodesic sphere mesh.

nodes.label: Voronoi Pattern
nodes.description: Generate a Voronoi pattern from a boundary surface.

nodes.label: Hexagonal Tiling
nodes.description: Generate a hexagonal tiling over a surface plane.

nodes.label: Offset Pattern
nodes.description: Inset and extrude faces to create panelized patterns.

nodes.label: Mesh Repair
nodes.description: Repair holes and weld close vertices.

nodes.label: Generate UVs
nodes.description: Generate UV coordinates for a mesh.

nodes.label: Mesh Decimate
nodes.description: Reduce mesh density via vertex clustering.

nodes.label: Quad Remesh
nodes.description: Merge adjacent triangles into quad-dominant faces.

nodes.label: STL Import
nodes.description: Import STL geometry into the scene.

nodes.label: STL Export
nodes.description: Export geometry to an STL file.

nodes.label: Origin
nodes.description: Emit the world origin vector (0, 0, 0).

nodes.label: Unit X
nodes.description: Emit the unit X axis vector.

nodes.label: Unit Y
nodes.description: Emit the unit Y axis vector.

nodes.label: Unit Z
nodes.description: Emit the unit Z axis vector.

nodes.label: Unit XYZ
nodes.description: Emit a unit vector with all components equal to one.

nodes.label: Move Vector
nodes.description: Move a vector by an offset vector.

nodes.label: Scale Vector
nodes.description: Scale a vector by a scalar multiplier.

nodes.label: List Create
nodes.description: Collect values into a list for downstream data operations.

nodes.label: List Length
nodes.description: Return the number of items in a list.

nodes.label: List Item
nodes.description: Pick a single item by index with clamp or wrap behavior.

nodes.label: List Index Of
nodes.description: Find the index of an item in a list using deep comparison.

nodes.label: List Partition
nodes.description: Split a list into partitions of fixed size and step.

nodes.label: List Flatten
nodes.description: Flatten nested lists by a specified depth.

nodes.label: List Slice
nodes.description: Extract a slice of a list with start, end, and step.

nodes.label: List Reverse
nodes.description: Reverse the order of items in a list.

nodes.label: Range
nodes.description: Generate a numeric sequence from Start to End using Step.

nodes.label: Linspace
nodes.description: Generate evenly spaced values between Start and End.

nodes.label: Remap
nodes.description: Remap a value from one range to another.

nodes.label: Random
nodes.description: Emit a deterministic random number from a seed.

nodes.label: Repeat
nodes.description: Repeat a value a specified number of times.

nodes.label: Linear Array
nodes.description: Duplicate points along a direction at a fixed spacing.

nodes.label: Polar Array
nodes.description: Distribute points around an axis with a sweep angle.

nodes.label: Grid Array
nodes.description: Create a rectangular grid of points from two axes.

nodes.label: Geometry Array
nodes.description: Duplicate geometry in linear, grid, or polar patterns.

nodes.label: List Sum
nodes.description: Sum numeric values from a list.

nodes.label: List Average
nodes.description: Average numeric values from a list.

nodes.label: List Min
nodes.description: Find the minimum numeric value in a list.

nodes.label: List Max
nodes.description: Find the maximum numeric value in a list.

nodes.label: List Median
nodes.description: Find the median numeric value in a list.

nodes.label: List Std Dev
nodes.description: Compute the population standard deviation of a list.

nodes.label: Geometry Info
nodes.description: Summarize geometry type and core element counts.

nodes.label: Measurement
nodes.description: Measure length, area, volume, or bounds.

nodes.label: Dimensions
nodes.description: Measure bounding box dimensions for geometry.

nodes.label: Geometry Vertices
nodes.description: Extract vertex positions from geometry as a list.

nodes.label: Geometry Edges
nodes.description: Extract edge segments as vector pairs.

nodes.label: Geometry Faces
nodes.description: Extract face centroids from mesh geometry.

nodes.label: Geometry Normals
nodes.description: Extract normals from mesh geometry.

nodes.label: Control Points
nodes.description: Extract control points or defining points from geometry.

nodes.label: Proximity 3D
nodes.description: Find nearby points in 3D and output connection pairs.

nodes.label: Proximity 2D
nodes.description: Find nearby points in 2D (projected) and output connection pairs.

nodes.label: Curve Proximity
nodes.description: Find closest points on a curve for a list of points.

nodes.label: Sine Wave
nodes.description: Generate a sine wave signal.

nodes.label: Cosine Wave
nodes.description: Generate a cosine wave signal.

nodes.label: Sawtooth Wave
nodes.description: Generate a sawtooth wave signal in the -1 to 1 range.

nodes.label: Triangle Wave
nodes.description: Generate a triangle wave signal in the -1 to 1 range.

nodes.label: Square Wave
nodes.description: Generate a square wave signal with adjustable duty cycle.

nodes.label: Point Generator
nodes.description: Create a point from coordinates.

nodes.label: Point Cloud
nodes.description: Create a point cloud from a list of points or geometry.

nodes.label: Line
nodes.description: Create a straight line between two points.

nodes.label: Rectangle
nodes.description: Create a rectangle on the construction plane.

nodes.label: Circle
nodes.description: Create a circular curve on the construction plane.

nodes.label: Arc
nodes.description: Create a circular arc through three points.

nodes.label: Curve
nodes.description: Create a smooth curve through points.

nodes.label: Polyline
nodes.description: Connect points into a polyline.

nodes.label: Surface
nodes.description: Generate a surface from boundary curves.

nodes.label: Loft
nodes.description: Create a surface through a series of section curves.

nodes.label: Extrude
nodes.description: Extrude a profile curve along a direction.

nodes.label: Pipe
nodes.description: Generate pipe meshes from segments, paths, or curve geometry.

nodes.label: Pipe Merge
nodes.description: Merge multiple pipe meshes, with optional joint spheres.

nodes.label: Boolean
nodes.description: Combine two solids with union, difference, or intersection.

nodes.label: Offset
nodes.description: Offset a curve by a given distance.

nodes.label: Fillet
nodes.description: Round corners on curves or edges.

nodes.label: Fillet Edges
nodes.description: Round selected mesh edges by a given radius.

nodes.label: Offset Surface
nodes.description: Offset a surface along its normals by a distance.

nodes.label: Thicken Mesh
nodes.description: Add thickness to a mesh by offsetting inward/outward.

nodes.label: Plasticwrap
nodes.description: Shrinkwrap geometry onto a target with a projection distance.

nodes.label: Solid
nodes.description: Cap a surface or open mesh into a closed solid.

nodes.label: Primitive
nodes.description: Create a parametric primitive shape.

nodes.label: Box Builder
nodes.description: Create a box primitive.

nodes.label: Sphere
nodes.description: Create a sphere primitive.

nodes.label: Voxelize Geometry
nodes.description: Convert geometry into a voxel grid domain.

nodes.label: Extract Isosurface
nodes.description: Create a mesh from a voxel density field.

nodes.description: Authoritative topology optimization settings and progress metadata.

nodes.description: Fast density solver prototype for a geometry domain.

nodes.description: Material transmutation solver for functionally graded blends.

nodes.label: Number
nodes.description: Emit a constant numeric value.

nodes.label: Add
nodes.description: Add two numeric values.

nodes.label: Subtract
nodes.description: Subtract B from A.

nodes.label: Multiply
nodes.description: Multiply two numeric values.

nodes.label: Divide
nodes.description: Divide A by B with stability checks.

nodes.label: Clamp
nodes.description: Clamp a value between a minimum and maximum.

nodes.label: Min
nodes.description: Return the smaller of two values.

nodes.label: Max
nodes.description: Return the larger of two values.

nodes.label: Expression
nodes.description: Evaluate a mathematical expression.

nodes.label: Scalar Functions
nodes.description: Apply common scalar functions to a value.

nodes.label: Toggle Switch
nodes.description: Manual on/off switch for boolean control signals.

nodes.label: Conditional Toggle Button
nodes.description: Toggle button switch for conditional enable/disable control.

nodes.label: Conditional
nodes.description: Select between two values using a condition.

nodes.label: Vector Compose
nodes.description: Compose a vector from X, Y, and Z scalar inputs.

nodes.label: Vector Decompose
nodes.description: Break a vector into its scalar components.

nodes.label: Vector Add
nodes.description: Add two vectors component-wise.

nodes.label: Vector Subtract
nodes.description: Subtract vector B from vector A.

nodes.label: Vector Scale
nodes.description: Scale a vector by a scalar multiplier.

nodes.label: Vector Length
nodes.description: Measure the magnitude of a vector.

nodes.label: Vector Normalize
nodes.description: Convert a vector to unit length.

nodes.label: Vector Dot
nodes.description: Compute the dot product between two vectors.

nodes.label: Vector Cross
nodes.description: Compute the cross product between two vectors.

nodes.label: Distance
nodes.description: Measure the distance between two points or vectors.

nodes.label: Vector From Points
nodes.description: Create a direction vector that points from A to B.

nodes.label: Vector Angle
nodes.description: Measure the angle between two vectors.

nodes.label: Vector Lerp
nodes.description: Linearly interpolate between two vectors using parameter T.

nodes.label: Vector Project
nodes.description: Project a vector onto another vector.

nodes.label: Point Attractor
nodes.description: Generate attraction vectors toward a target point.

nodes.label: Move
nodes.description: Translate geometry by world-space XYZ offsets.

nodes.label: Rotate
nodes.description: Rotate geometry around an axis.

nodes.label: Scale
nodes.description: Scale geometry around a pivot point.

nodes.label: Field Transformation
nodes.description: Transform geometry using a scalar or vector field.

nodes.label: Move Point
nodes.description: Move a point along a direction vector by a distance.

nodes.label: Move Point By Vector
nodes.description: Move a point directly by an offset vector.

nodes.label: Rotate Vector
nodes.description: Rotate a vector around an axis by an angle in degrees.

nodes.label: Mirror Vector
nodes.description: Reflect a vector across a plane defined by a normal.
